medical_history.chief_complaint: Increased tracer uptake in the medial aspect of the right femoral shaft, mimicking recurrent osteosarcoma.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient is a 15-year-old boy diagnosed with high-grade osteosarcoma 3 months ago. He had no complaints of pain or swelling of his right leg after surgery, but recent imaging showed increased tracer uptake suggesting recurrence.
medical_history.past_medical_history: High-grade osteosarcoma in the right distal femur, treated with chemotherapy, surgical resection, and right knee arthroplasty 3 months prior to this case.
